para.p: foo is NOT defined, it is NOT cs-defined, it is NOT relax, and it is NOT @defined.
After @ifundefined, however, foo IS defined, it IS cs-defined, it IS relax, but it is still NOT @defined.
baz is NOT defined, it is NOT cs-defined, and it is NOT relax. Now, baz is still NOT defined, it is still NOT cs-defined, and it is still NOT relax.
baz is NOT defined, it is NOT cs-defined, and it is NOT relax. However, after ifx csname concoction [is ], baz IS defined, it IS cs-defined, and it IS relax.
Let zonk to relax. zonk IS defined, it IS cs-defined, it IS relax, and it is NOT @defined.
Let zoob to a undefined token. zoob is NOT defined, it is NOT cs-defined, it is NOT relax, and it is NOT @defined.

Let zook to a plain letter.
zook IS defined, it IS cs-defined, it is NOT relax, and it IS @defined.
